name: Peter's Fighter Game Prototype
description:
A small gameplay prototype I made with the goal of making a fighting game that "feels good". Not really sure what that means anymore but I hope I've done a decent job so far.

Features include:

  • 1 Character, I know it's a lot I really went overboard.
  • Offline Versus Mode
  • Training Mode

Features I want to add in the future:

  • Online Multiplayer
  • Versus CPU

Smaller improvements I want to make include better VFX for basic attacks, improve some of the animations, music, and maybe a "variation" style system to make up for the lack of characters.

Donations are very appreciated but this project was always meant to be free so don't feel bad about not donating : )
